title: How to Order
content:
<!--StartFragment-->

## ARTISAN TREATS MADE WITH LOVE

At Cakes & Crumbs, each cake is a piece of art.  Every cake is handmade and customised to the way you want it.  Our mission is that you carry home boxes of happiness to be savoured and shared...         

- - -

## CAKE FLAVOURS 

​1) Sugee Cake (Best Seller!)\

2. Premium Butter Cake\
3. Premium Butter Orange Cake\
4. Chocolate Fudge Cake\
5. Chocolate Orange Fudge Cake​ Carrot Pecan & Cream Cheese Cake
6.
7.
8. Black Forest\
   ​8) Red Velvet (with Beetroot powder)\
   ​Note: Cakes are frosted with Italian Meringue Buttercream

- - -

## CAKE FILLINGS

(For Butter and Chocolate Cakes)

1. Vanilla Buttercream\
2. Dark Chocolate Ganache\
3. Strawberry Compote\
4. Salted Caramel Buttercream\
   ​5) Cookies & Cream\

- - -

## HOW TO ORDER

1. Choose your cake flavour & suitable cake filling (we will advise accordingly when you place an order with us)\
2. Choose your cake design theme from our website or any photo sample that you have\
3. Watsapp us to place an order with the date you need the cake and number of pax\
   ​\
   Note: Cake price depends on cake flavour and filling, size and type of design.  We will need 5-6 days advance notice for all orders. TQ.\
   \
   ​  

## TEL/WATSAPP: +6012-2917326
